name: Mental Prison (44pes)
description:
Simple metroidvania created for Godot Wild Jam #33.

Go through the different rooms collecting the improvements and find the white room.

Keyboard controls:

  • Arrows to move 
  • x: jump
  • z: shoot

Spoiler: The end of the game is kind of weird and it's supposed to close the game window, but in the browser version it doesn't work (because closing the browser is a bit extreme XD)
